title: WeWork reportedly working on Apple Wallet support for company Access Cards￼
content:
WeWork is reportedly working on Apple Wallet support for its company Access Cards. This feature was discovered by MacRumors through image assets and hidden code within the WeWork app’s code. 

more…

The post WeWork reportedly working on Apple Wallet support for company Access Cards￼ appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: WeWork is reportedly working on Apple Wallet support for its Access Card. This was discovered by MacRumors through code in WeWork's app.
